recordCreatedDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was created

recordLastEditDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was last edited

tagEpc.description:
The unique identifier provided  by the tag on the item.
This is set to 512 because that is what our firmware can handle,
and we may potentially need to handle values that long.

productId.description: Id value for this Item's product.

batch.description: Batch value that the Item was produced in.

serial.description: The unique serialized number used to identify this Item.

expirationDate.description: The date that the Item expires.

deviceId.description: Foreign key Id of the Device that read the Item.

aliasId.description: Foreign key Id of the Alias that read the Item.

recordCreatedDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was created

recordLastEditDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was last edited

recordCreatedDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was created

recordLastEditDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was last edited

id.description: Unique identifier of par level group

LocationIds.description: Ids of locations that have been assigned to par level group

parLevels.description: Par levels that have been assigned to par level group

productCode.description: Product code that par level is for

ApiParLevelModel.description: API Model representing a ParLevel item

active.description: Bool indicating if product is active

isRfid.description: Bool indicating if this product is an RFID product

recordCreatedDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was created

recordLastEditDate.description: Datetime indicating when the record was last edited
